subject: Tennis
organizations: United States Mens Clay Court Championship
lead_paragraph: Donald Young Jr. beat Juan Monaco, 6-7 (4), 6-4, 6-3, to advance to the quarterfinals of the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston.
snippet: Donald Young Jr. beat Juan Monaco, 6-7 (4), 6-4, 6-3, to advance to the quarterfinals of the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston.
